ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A generic function and a set of methods to calculate highest density intervals for a variety of classes of objects which can specify a probability density distribution, including MCMC output, fitted density objects, and functions.

A generic function and a set of methods to calculate highest density intervals for a variety of classes of objects which can specify a probability density distribution, including MCMC output, fitted density objects, and functions.

name: r-hdinterval
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-hdinterval
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: HDInterval_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/HDInterval_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/HDInterval/HDInterval_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bb07f0edd660a02ed18e578c2798eb8c2db0e181a5e0c3e23db182d13e9494f6

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('HDInterval')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('HDInterval')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=HDInterval
  license: GPL-3
  summary: A generic function and a set of methods to calculate highest density intervals for a variety of classes of objects which can specify a probability density distribution, including MCMC output, fitted density objects, and functions.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
